name: Humind
description:
We are French students and this is our first video game, we hope you'll enjoy it.

"Humind" is a class project developped in 4 months. We had to make one level of a game. The imposed theme was "Mechanic". We chose to work on the story of a little robot in a world where any form of life disappeared. In this level you have to go an get gas for your ship.

- Better in Full Screen

- Be carefull, you have to press "E" for the first switch.

The team :

Benjamin Fromont : bemonart.portfoliobox.net

Maxime Lancelot : brizoft.itch.io

Eva Meurice : evam.portfoliobox.net

Pierre-Adrien Devaux : www.pierreadriendevaux.com
